question:
Your local hospital has advertised for people to do unpaid work helping at the hospitsal. You would like to do some work at the hospital in your free time. 
Write a letter to the hospital. In your letter
-explain why you would like to do unpaid work at the hospital
-say what type of unpaid work you would be able to do
-give details of when you would be available for this work
text: I, Duangjai, am writing this letter to express my interest to do unpaid work at Stay hospital because I have seen an advertisement in the local newspaper recently.

Let me go into more details, I have recently graduated with my bachelor’s degree in healthcare service, and now I am a part-time healthcare adviser at a sports club. Additionally, helping people with their mental issues is my passion. Besides, I want to become more professional in the related fields. That is why I am interested in doing volunteer work in the regional area. Hence, I would like to work in the same position as now.
As you know, I am a part-time staff so I will be available from 6PM- 10PM on a daily basis.
If you require any further information which all necessary detail is attached, please do not hesitate to contact me anytime.
